case.title: Great conversation & laughter - 31 ( Midtown)
case.text: Nice looking, intelligent, loves to laugh, hard working, and gentle woman seeks a man with similar characteristics for ltr, that could lead to more. You: 30-50 y/o. Must be unmarried, no side women, successful, non smoker. I enjoy cultural and the outdoors, but will get into sports! If you could send a note with your picture. I can't wait to hear from you. Me: small frame, long hair, feminine.
